author: jstrachan
msg: Patched the <ant> task so that references and properties can be exported to the projects build.xml
This allows a projects build.xml to call Maven to download the jars, set the classpath and build the code and then do some other task, such as running example programs or specific test cases.

author: vmassol
msg: ability to change executables name and path for SSH and SCP commands (used to deploy the web site). I needed this to support my plink and pscp executables on windows for example.

author: vmassol
msg: allow override of properties (for example maven.home and lib.repo)

author: dion
msg: Removed the usage of maven.src.dir and replaced it with the new
